Posts.Content: Mar 19, 2010 09:06AM shelliksmom wrote: 35 - I am 66 this year.  Found lump at 33 - doctor said it was just a swollen mammory gland.  2 years later found lump in exact same place.  It was Metaplastic Carcinoma.
Posts.Title: Poll - How old were you when dx with BC Times3 Minetta57

Posts.Content: Dec 14, 2007 09:54PM - edited Dec 14, 2007 09:58PM by shelliksmom We are doing ok.  Christmas is bittersweet this year.  It has to be nice for all the kids.  Karl is doing a great job with the children.  They still have their nanny (Ashley) and I and their other grandma do whatever we can  to help Karl.  We both live within 3 miles of Karl. Lori and Traci are missing their sister so much.  Lori couldn't even put her tree up so her husband did.  You girls are so sweet to think about us.  I am looking forward to Jan. 2008....hoping that it gets a little easier.  We miss our sweet Shelli so much.  I can't believe how many "sisters" have died since Shelli passed.  I follow Bimmer's story and my heart breaks for him.  I e-mail Geeta often.  She is so beautiful and has a beautiful family.  Geeta's mom e-mailed me a few weeks ago.  I keep coming to this site and noone understands why I do this.  I guess it is because my Shelli still lives on here and I guess it is just a tie for me and comforting to know that you all think about her.  Merry Christmas to all of you.  I pray for you every night.  Thank you Janis.  If I remember right you sent flowers to Shelli's house. Sandy
Posts.Title: Shelli's mom... Fitztwins katie11

Posts.Content: Sep 10, 2008 08:07PM shelliksmom wrote: Hi to all.  I am Shelli's mom (Sandy).  It was so nice to see that you were thinking about my Shelli.  It will be a year on the 19th of this month.  Yes, I still lurk here.  I can't tell you all how much I miss her.  Her children are doing pretty well.  They have had to make a lot of adjustments in the past year and it has been a big challenge for them.  They are all so sweet.  Hunter is in 6th grade, Kara 2nd and Olivia 1st.  I live very close to them and we see them often. I still pray for all of you at night.  It still comforts me to come to this site.  I printed all of your posts last year and read them all to her.  She always smiled.  You were a very important part of her life.  I keep in touch with Geeta and she is doing well.  God bless all of you. Sandy
Posts.Title: I miss KariLynn Bugs ADK
